paragraph.value: A further two datasets, Berkeley Earth (Rohde et al., 2013) and that of the Japan Meteorological Agency (JMA), are provided in Table 1.1. This working definition provides an updated estimate of

paragraph.expression: numToStr (head (map (fun x -> x.trend_1880_2012) (filter (fun x -> x.dataset == "Average") tableData)))

paragraph.value: °C for the warming over the period 1880 - 2012 based on a linear trend. This quantity was quoted as

paragraph.expression: numToStr (head (map (fun x -> x.trend_1880_2012) (filter (fun x -> x.dataset == "NOAAGlobalTemp") tableData)))

paragraph.value: °C in the AR5. Hence the inclusion of the Cowtan-Way dataset (

paragraph.expression: numToStr (head (map (fun x -> x.trend_1880_2012) (filter (fun x -> x.dataset == "Cowtan-Way") tableData)))

paragraph.value: does not introduce any inconsistency with the AR5.
